objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' fill='none'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#F6EDE4'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#gradient)'/><rect x='0' y='700' width='1080' height='380' fill='#8A6F58' opacity='0.15'/><rect x='750' y='0' width='330' height='1080' fill='#D9C3AF' opacity='0.35'/><circle cx='850' cy='250' r='180' fill='#D9C3AF' opacity='0.4'/><circle cx='180' cy='880' r='150' fill='#8A6F58' opacity='0.25'/><path d='M0 350 L1080 350' stroke='#8A6F58' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M0 550 L1080 550' stroke='#8A6F58' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M0 750 L1080 750' stroke='#8A6F58' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.2'/><g opacity='0.2'><path d='M120 120 A40 40 0 0 1 160 80' stroke='#8A6F58' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M960 120 A40 40 0 0 0 920 80' stroke='#8A6F58' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M120 960 A40 40 0 0 0 160 1000' stroke='#8A6F58' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M960 960 A40 40 0 0 1 920 1000' stroke='#8A6F58' stroke-width='2'/></g><defs><linearGradient id='gradient' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1080' y2='1080' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><stop offset='0' stop-color='#F6EDE4'/><stop offset='1' stop-color='#E6D5C5'/></linearGradient></defs></svg>

objects.text:
• Premium 2-piece hair care system
• Advanced damage repair formula
• Anti-frizz technology
• Intense nourishment

product_details.name: Ela De Pure Luxury Moisturizing Hair Care Set - Transform Dry, Frizzy Hair into Silky Smooth Perfection
product_details.description:
• Premium 2-piece hair care system with moisturizing shampoo and conditioner
• Advanced damage repair formula for stressed and dry hair
• Anti-frizz technology for smooth, manageable hair
• Intense nourishment for deep hair restoration
• Generous 280ml/9.5 fl.oz size for long-lasting use
• Professional-grade formula in elegant minimalist packaging
• Suitable for all hair types needing moisture and repair
• Paraben-free and gentle daily use formula
• Modern pump dispenser for convenient application
• Luxurious salon-quality results at home

banner_details:
This visually balanced banner blends warm, elegant tones to promote a premium hair care product. The design features a dual-line header (`heading_1`, `heading_2`) in a sophisticated serif font for a classy appeal. Just below is a strong subheadline (`subheading`) that introduces the product's key benefit, leading into a concise feature list (`description`) emphasizing quality and effectiveness. Positioned centrally is an attractive product image (`product_image`) tilted diagonally for dynamic emphasis. A bold value proposition shows through the `price` and `tagline`, with a prominent call-to-action button (`cta_background`, `cta`) in earthy tones, and subtle urgency text (`urgency_text`) below. 

**Color palette:**
- Cream Beige (#F6EDE4)
- Rosy Tan (#D9C3AF)
- Mocha Brown (#8A6F58)
- Deep Espresso (#5D4637)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a minimalist and elegant color palette that includes muted beige (#D9C9B5), deep black (#1A1A1A), and soft white (#F5F5F5). The beige tone of the bottles provides a clean, natural, and organic appeal, resonating with themes of purity and moisture. The black pump caps and bold black typography create strong contrast, making the labels easily readable and visually striking. The color blending is seamless, with soft lighting that enhances the matte texture, giving a luxurious and modern feel. For an advertisement banner, combining these tones with a muted cream background (#EFE9E0) and subtle shadowing would emulate the product’s premium quality.
